import Referee from"../Referee";export const kingMove=(initialPosition,desiredPosition,team,dx,dy,stepX,stepY,boardState)=>{//one tile movement
if(Math.abs(dx)<=1&&Math.abs(dy)<=1){return!Referee.tileIsOccupied(desiredPosition,boardState)||Referee.tileIsOccupiedByOpponent(desiredPosition,boardState,team);}return false;};
